page.title: 05EDUCATION
page.content:
State Education in Chesterfield comes under the{Derbyshire Education {Authority.
Chesterfield has 24{infant and {junior schools}(some with{nursery {units)}with over 5000 pupils aged {from }3 to 11 years.
At age 11 the children transfer to one of the 10{Secondary Schools}which cater for over 6000 pupils. After two years at Secondary School children may transfer to another school if they wish to take courses leading to {further education.
There are two{Special Schools}for children with educational difficulties and also a{Technical College}and a {College of Art and Design.
